Content: Speaker Karu Jayasuriya says that he was requested by the Chief Prelates and the Anunayakas of Siyamnikaya to maintain discipline and unity within the United National Party. The speaker received blessings from the Chief Prelate of Malwathu chapter Ven. Thibbatuwawe Sri Sumangala Thera at the MalwathuMahaViharaya. The speaker also called on the Anunayaka Ven. DimbulkumbureWimaladarma Thera. Karu Jayasuriya subsequently called on Chief Prelate of Asgiri Chapter Ven. Varakagoda Sri Gnanarathana Thera at the AsgiriViharaya. The Speaker replying to quarries made by the reporters said that he is unable to meddle into internal affairs of the Party in the caliber of the Speaker. He said that however he will be attending to the request of the Chief Prelates, while considering limitations of his position. The Speaker noted that he will remain unbiased. He highlighted that his full support will be extended to the Elections Commission to ensure that the upcoming Parliamentary Election is free and fair. He mentioned that discussions have already been conducted with the Elections Commission.
